languages.text: {n}Лифт был оснащен предохранителями, тормозящими кабину в шахте в случае аварии — как минимум половина из них не сработала. Ваше падение не было случайностью.{/n}
{n}The elevator was equipped with safety devices meant to stop the cabin inside the shaft, but at least half of them have failed. Your fall was no accident.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Лифт был оснащен предохранителями, тормозящими кабину в шахте в случае аварии — как минимум половина из них не сработала. Ваше падение не было случайностью.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The elevator was equipped with safety devices meant to stop the cabin inside the shaft, but at least half of them have failed. Your fall was no accident.{/n}
{n}A cable this thick cannot break on its own, and the elevator was equipped with safety devices to stop the cabin inside the shaft, but at least half of them failed. Your fall was no accident.{/n}

{n}A cable this thick could not break on its own. Moreover, the elevator was equipped with safety devices meant to stop the cabin inside the shaft, but at least half of them have failed. Your fall was no accident.{/n}

{n}A cable this thick could not break on its own. Moreover, the elevator was equipped with safety devices meant to stop the cabin inside the shaft, but at least half of them have failed. Your fall was no accident.{/n}
{n}The elevator was equipped with safety devices meant to stop the cabin inside the shaft, but at least half of them have failed. Your fall was no accident.{/n}
{n}The elevator was equipped with safety devices meant to stop the cabin inside the shaft, but at least half of them have failed. Your fall was no accident.{/n}
{n}The elevator was equipped with safety devices meant to stop the cabin inside the shaft, but at least half of them have failed. Your fall was no accident.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El ascensor contaba con dispositivos de seguridad diseñados para detener la cabina, pero al menos la mitad de ellos han fallado. Esto no ha sido un accidente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The elevator was equipped with safety devices meant to stop the cabin inside the shaft, but at least half of them have failed. Your fall was no accident.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un cable de este grosor no puede romperse por sí solo. Lo que es más, el ascensor contaba con dispositivos de seguridad diseñados para detener la cabina, pero al menos la mitad de ellos han fallado. Esto no ha sido un accidente.{/n}
{n}El ascensor contaba con dispositivos de seguridad diseñados para detener la cabina, pero al menos la mitad de ellos han fallado. Esto no ha sido un accidente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}エレベーターには昇降路のキャビンを停止する安全装置が完備しているが、少なく見てもその半分が故障していた。あの落下は事故ではなかったのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The elevator was equipped with safety devices meant to stop the cabin inside the shaft, but at least half of them have failed. Your fall was no accident.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}これほど太いケーブルが何もせず切れるはずがない。それに、エレベーターには昇降路のキャビンを停止する安全装置が完備しているが、少なく見てもその半分が故障していた。あの落下は事故ではなかったのだ。{/n}
{n}これほど太いケーブルが何もせず切れるはずがない。それに、エレベーターには昇降路のキャビンを停止する安全装置が完備しているが、少なく見てもその半分が故障していた。あの落下は事故ではなかったのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}电梯配备了许多安全装置，可以在电梯掉落的时候将其固定在竖井里，但至少有一半的装置发生了故障。可以说，你乘坐的电梯掉落下来，这绝对不是意外。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The elevator was equipped with safety devices meant to stop the cabin inside the shaft, but at least half of them have failed. Your fall was no accident.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这么粗的钢缆绝对不可能自行断裂。除此之外，电梯还配备了许多安全装置，可以在电梯掉落的时候将其固定在竖井里，但至少有一半的装置发生了故障。可以说，你乘坐的电梯掉落下来，这绝对不是意外。{/n}
{n}这么粗的钢缆绝对不可能自行断裂。除此之外，电梯还配备了许多安全装置，可以在电梯掉落的时候将其固定在竖井里，但至少有一半的装置发生了故障。可以说，你乘坐的电梯掉落下来，这绝对不是意外。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Aufzug war mit Sicherheitsvorrichtungen versehen, die die Kabine im Schacht stoppen sollten, aber mindestens die Hälfte davon hat versagt. Dein Sturz war kein Unfall.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The elevator was equipped with safety devices meant to stop the cabin inside the shaft, but at least half of them have failed. Your fall was no accident.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein solch dickes Kabel kann nicht von allein reißen. Darüber hinaus war der Aufzug mit Sicherheitsvorrichtungen versehen, die die Kabine im Schacht stoppen sollten, doch mindestens die Hälfte davon hat versagt. Dein Sturz war kein Unfall.{/n}

{n}Ein solch dickes Kabel kann nicht von allein reißen. Darüber hinaus war der Aufzug mit Sicherheitsvorrichtungen versehen, die die Kabine im Schacht stoppen sollten, doch mindestens die Hälfte davon hat versagt. Dein Sturz war kein Unfall.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'ascenseur était équipé de dispositifs de sécurité conçus pour arrêter la cabine en cas d'urgence, dont la moitié au moins semble ne pas s'être enclenchée. Votre chute n'était pas un accident.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The elevator was equipped with safety devices meant to stop the cabin inside the shaft, but at least half of them have failed. Your fall was no accident.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Impossible qu'un câble de cette épaisseur ait cédé tout seul, sans même parler des dispositifs de sécurité conçus pour arrêter la cabine en cas d'urgence, dont la moitié au moins semble ne pas s'être enclenchée. Votre chute n'était pas un accident.{/n}

{n}L'ascenseur était équipé de dispositifs de sécurité conçus pour arrêter la cabine en cas d'urgence, dont la moitié au moins semble ne pas s'être enclenchée. Votre chute n'était pas un accident.{/n}
